title: Spacious 2 bed, 1 bath in multi-family, 1 pkg, great location. Photos
posting_body: ['This unit has hardwood floors, lots of sunlight,', 'hardwood floors, 2 bedrooms, 1 bath and an eat-in-kitchen', 'with dishwasher, gas stove and built-in microwave.', 'No pets or smoking.', 'This unit has ceiling fans, high ceilings,', 'and a porch.', ' Best location, walk to express bus Boston,', 'Kenmore, etc., supermarket, parks and restaurants.', 'Parking for 1 car included.', 'Tenant responsible for utilities.', 'Available for 9/1.', 'Washer/dryer in unit.', 'Monthly income required is approx.', '$6,000.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'This unit will not last', 'on the market.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,300.', 'if you rent this unit.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Please reference: 2 bed in Newton, $2,300 in your text or message']
